definition: to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: It was the first high-volume mass -produced model.
sentences.chinese: 它是第一款大批量生產的車型。

sentences.english: Is a first article run prior to etching the lot to confirm etcher settings and linewidths?
sentences.chinese: 在批量蝕刻前是否進行首件與確認蝕刻機設備與線徑？

sentences.english: Low-alcohol Lujiu (liquors produced in Shandong) is the first to enter national market in quantities.
sentences.chinese: 低度魯酒率先大批量地走向全國市場。

sentences.english: Then by tissue culture, virus-free strawberry plants were propagated in bulk.
sentences.chinese: 批量繁殖草莓無毒苗得到成功。

sentences.english: The Dräger Prestor is an effective mask test device for complete testing of full face masks.
sentences.chinese: 這個特點保證了大批量面罩的有效測試。

sentences.english: For example, each time a new product name is added, you can have it trigger a batch update .
sentences.chinese: 例如，每當添加新產品名時，可以讓它觸發批量更新。

sentences.english: Rapid silica gel vacuum reverse mould, SLA rapid prototype, oil spraying and small lot production.
sentences.chinese: 快速硅膠真空倒模，復模，噴油及小批量生產。

sentences.english: All refractory items are to be placed lot wise and any damage done will be to the contractor's responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 所有耐材應批量堆放，如果產生損壞則由承包商負責。

sentences.english: Reducing order lead time can be taken by reducing batch.
sentences.chinese: 可以通過訂貨小批量化縮短訂貨提前期。

sentences.english: Coarse figurines are made from moulds and produced in large numbers as toys.
sentences.chinese: 粗貨爲玩具，用模具翻制，大批量生產。

sentences.english: Mass production started in the early 1900s.
sentences.chinese: 20世紀早期，情人卡開始批量生產。

sentences.english: The main theme of this paper is queue model with batch arrival and multi-server.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究批量到達的多服務檯排隊模型。

sentences.english: The displayed models use 500 ccm ATV Motor which are already mass produced.
sentences.chinese: 展出的汽車模型，用500連鑄亞視目前已批量生產。

sentences.english: The 21st century's drink developed by this factory has already been in mass production.
sentences.chinese: 本飲料廠研製的二十一世紀飲品已投入批量生產。

sentences.english: A shell covers the large-volume airbox located over the engine.
sentences.chinese: 一顆炮彈包括大批量進氣箱設在引擎。

definition: to copy/to imitate/to make by imitating a model
to use anywhere, anytime (card, ticket etc)/to be used by everyone (language, textbook etc)/(of two or more things) interchangeable
to duplicate/to make a copy of/to copy/to reproduce/to clone
to procure (for an enterprise etc)/to purchase
